page.title: 15Longnor Entertainment
page.content:
At home we watch television. I think that plays an important part. It's rather silly, I know, to depend on a piece of machinery for entertainment.
In Longnor there are quite a lot of activities. On Mondays many young people go to the Youth Club at Warslow. On a Tuesday there is a Young Farmers' Club. Brownies are on another day and there are other community gatherings. The chip shop is open every night except Monday and Thursday. There used to be occasional discos but they don't happen any more.
I play in the Warslow Silver Band. We go round pubs at weekends and sometimes I can't do my homework. We play hymns; my favourite is 'Thine be the glory'.
